title: All About Kamala Harris' Mother, Who Grew Up In India And Moved To US
content: Kamala Harris accepted the Democratic presidential nomination in Chicago today and remembered her Indian-origin mother Shyamala Gopalan Harris before a rapturous crowd.
summary: Kamala Harris accepted the Democratic presidential nomination in Chicago today and remembered her Indian-origin mother Shyamala Gopalan Harris before a rapturous crowd.

title: In Kamala Harris' Democratic Convention Speech, A Mention Of India
content: Kamala Harris took to the stage, not just as a candidate for the highest office in the land but as a proud daughter of immigrants as well.Â

title: "Star Of My Life": All About Kamala Harris' Mother, Shyamala Gopalan
content: When US Vice President Kamala Harris talks about her South Asian identity, it's usually in the context of her mother, Shyamala Gopalan. The same was true on Thursday during Ms Harris' speech on the fourth night of the DNC.
summary: When US Vice President Kamala Harris talks about her South Asian identity, it's usually in the context of her mother, Shyamala Gopalan. The same was true on Thursday during Ms Harris' speech on the fourth night of the DNC.

title: Instagram, TikTok Stars Get VIP Treatment At Kamala Harris' Democrat Event
content: The Kamala Harris campaign rolled out the blue carpet for social media influencers at the Democratic National Convention this week, hoping that they can help get out the vote to beat Donald Trump.

title: Live: PM Modi To Visit Ukraine Today, Meet President Zelensky
content: PM Modi Ukraine Visit:  PM Modi is headed for his much-anticipated trip to Ukraine after wrapping up his two-day visit to Poland this morning.

title: Kamala Harris' Donald Trump Warning As She Accepts Presidential Nomination
content: Vice President Kamala Harris today formally accepted the Democratic Party's 2024 presidential nomination to fight against her Republican rival Donald Trump.

title: Hindus In US Form Group To Rally Support For Kamala Harris
content: Some Hindus in the US have come together to create "Hindus For Kamala Harris", a support group for the Democratic presidential nominee, saying she would be good for India, America and the world.
summary: Some Hindus in the US have come together to create "Hindus For Kamala Harris", a support group for the Democratic presidential nominee, saying she would be good for India, America and the world.

title: Hundreds Of Sea Lions Take Over California Beach Ousting People
content: Hundreds of California sea lions have taken over San Carlos Beach in Monterey, California, prompting local officials to close the area to people.
summary: Hundreds of California sea lions have taken over San Carlos Beach in Monterey, California, prompting local officials to close the area to people.

title: 2,492-Carat Diamond, Believed To Be World's 2nd Largest, Found In Botswana
content: The largest diamond found in more than a century has been unearthed in Botswana at a mine owned by Canadian firm Lucara Diamond, the BBC reported.
summary: The largest diamond found in more than a century has been unearthed in Botswana at a mine owned by Canadian firm Lucara Diamond, the BBC reported.

title: Kamala Harris To Take The Stage On Last Day Of Democratic Convention
content: The Democratic National Convention, a four-day mega event which saw a tearful Joe Biden getting a farewell, and Kamala Harris making a surprise entry in a tan suit, will end today.
summary: The Democratic National Convention, a four-day mega event which saw a tearful Joe Biden getting a farewell, and Kamala Harris making a surprise entry in a tan suit, will end today.

title: Seven Killed, 12 Injured In South Korea Hotel Fire
content: Seven people were killed and 12 others injured in a fire at a hotel in South Korea, authorities said Friday.
summary: Seven people were killed and 12 others injured in a fire at a hotel in South Korea, authorities said Friday.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy Says Kamala Harris Is "A Cog In Wheel And Puppet"
content: Vice President Kamala Harris is "a cog in the wheel and a puppet", Republican leader Vivek Ramaswamy said on Thursday, and added that the Democratic presidential candidate is staying away from talking about policy in her speeches.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris is "a cog in the wheel and a puppet", Republican leader Vivek Ramaswamy said on Thursday, and added that the Democratic presidential candidate is staying away from talking about policy in her speeches.

title: Iceland Volcano Erupts, Spewing Lava Fountains
content: A volcano in southwestern Iceland erupted on Thursday, the meteorological office said, spraying red-hot lava and smoke in its sixth outbreak since December.
summary: A volcano in southwestern Iceland erupted on Thursday, the meteorological office said, spraying red-hot lava and smoke in its sixth outbreak since December.

title: Manhunt In Arizona For Suspect Who Threatened To Kill Trump
content: An Arizona man is wanted after threatening over social media to kill former President Donald Trump, the Cochise County Sheriff's Office said on Thursday.
summary: An Arizona man is wanted after threatening over social media to kill former President Donald Trump, the Cochise County Sheriff's Office said on Thursday.

title: UN Chief Hopes PM Modi's Visit To Ukraine Will Help End War
content: UN Secretary-General hopes that Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visit to Ukraine will contribute to ending the war, his Spokesperson Stephane Dujarric said on Thursday.
summary: UN Secretary-General hopes that Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visit to Ukraine will contribute to ending the war, his Spokesperson Stephane Dujarric said on Thursday.

title: Nestle CEO Mark Schneider To Step Down, Laurent Freixe To Take Over
content: Nestle chief executive Mark Schneider is leaving the Swiss food group after eight years in charge and will be replaced by Latin America boss Laurent Freixe, the company said Thursday.
summary: Nestle chief executive Mark Schneider is leaving the Swiss food group after eight years in charge and will be replaced by Latin America boss Laurent Freixe, the company said Thursday.

title: Man Throws Open Plane Emergency Door On Landing, Climbs Over Wing
content: A passenger on Australian budget carrier Jetstar threw open an emergency door and exited by clambering over the wing and engine after landing in Melbourne on Thursday, officials said.
summary: A passenger on Australian budget carrier Jetstar threw open an emergency door and exited by clambering over the wing and engine after landing in Melbourne on Thursday, officials said.
